item.title: Jail Code And makeGlobalObject Codes And New Areas
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

My Problem Is My Jail Code. It Doesnâ€™t Work. But I Think I Did It Wrong Anyway

} } if (command.startsWith("jail") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID (otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p= (client) server.playerHandler.players [otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = 3227; p.teleportToY = 3667; p.heightLevel = 0; p.updateRequired = true; p.sendMessage("You Have Been Thrown In Jail!"); } else { sendMessage("That Name Doesn't Exist."); if (teleblock == true); sendMessage("A Magical Force Prevents You From Teleporting."); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering the name you want to jail.");
I know i badly fail but if someone could help me with that, one other thing is makeGlobalObject codes, i dont know them, is there a list anywhere, can someone post a link to a list or can you tell me gates and walls.

Last but not least is area making, how is it done?
